name: Classic Car City Race 3D
description:
Usually, city streets, especially in the big city, can’t be used as racing tracks. Streets are full of motor car and bikes, bus drivers and school bus drivers do their job, helping passengers to reach work or school, people are walking through the streets holding coffee cups… Everything is calm, nobody hasten nowhere. But today is a special day – streets are closed for the special racing championship. This champ called Classic Car City Race 3D, and you are the main favorite, so try your best!

Drive your sport car, avoid crashing and try to be as fast as possible. Set new world record and beat your own record again! There are two game modes - free practice and time challenge. In both modes you can earn points to buy new cars.

Classic Car City Racing 3D game features:
- Real city car racing 3D;
- Different car models - bigfoots, sport cars, buggy etc.;
- Realistic car driving;
- Two game modes: free practice and time challenge;
- Earn points to buy new car;
- Amazing graphics and stunning animation.

Feel like a real city racer – drive through the streets, do crazy tricks and enjoy high speed! Meet Classic Car City Race 3D – incredible driving simulator!
